_description: The manner of turning to God — three couplets with internal rhyme in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook, introduced by ‘ȝe suln turnen to God’.

NLS18721.Transcription:
Rediliche withouten abidingHoliche withouten ony
                    fenyingGladliche withouten vnbuxumnesseSadliche withouten gret
                    hastinessePriuiliche withouten gret criȝing& lestendliche
                    withouten ony stinting
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 54.
